roleset.name: to gather sponges (the sea creature)
roleset.note:
Frames file for 'sponge' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 13.7.
frame by Perryn

roleset.name: act like a sponge, leach off some entity

example.name: args 0, 2
example.text: To those whom the welfare state is the biggest concern I think the problem arises from the fact that there are already too many english people sponging off the state and if we add any more people be it immigrants or " britons " our state of government would collapse and then our economy .

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT. Comparison to leach.01. No VNcls.
